title: The Embedded Circuit
description: Workers at the Reclamation Yard, who process salvaged Scourge debris, have recovered a metal panel with a functioning circuit array unlike anything in current use. Ward Technician Vera believes it may be Concordat communication infrastructure that somehow survived the Scourge event.

turns.narrative: The panel is roughly A-metre square, made of an alloy no one at the yard recognises, still faintly warm to the touch despite having been buried for decades. When Vera applies a small charge, a soft amber light pulses from embedded nodes.
turns.choice_a: Apply a larger charge to see if the full circuit activates
turns.consequence_a: The circuit activates. A short burst of encoded data transmits outward. Vera's instruments detect a responding signal from somewhere in the Undercity.
turns.choice_b: Have Vera analyse the alloy and node structure carefully before applying any power
turns.consequence_b: Vera confirms the alloy is Concordat-grade composite — used in their long-range relay infrastructure.

turns.narrative: The responding signal from the Undercity is alarming. Something down there is active and receiving.
turns.choice_a: Report the active Undercity signal to the Academic Quarter for immediate investigation
turns.consequence_a: Researchers confirm the Undercity signal matches several known Concordat relay frequencies.
turns.choice_b: Block the circuit's transmission capability before reporting — prevent further signals
turns.consequence_b: Vera modifies the panel to receive-only. The responding signal continues but nothing else is transmitted.

turns.narrative: The panel itself is valuable — it still functions and is made of materials not currently producible.
turns.choice_a: Secure the panel for the Academic Quarter as a research specimen
turns.consequence_a: The Academic Quarter accepts the panel gratefully. Vera is invited to join the research team.
turns.choice_b: Leave the panel with the Reclamation Yard under a research agreement
turns.consequence_b: The Yard retains custody but grants academic access. Vera oversees the arrangement.

panel_secured.description: Panel secured by the Academic Quarter. Vera joins research team.

yard_retained.description: Panel stays at the Yard under research agreement.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: Panel secured by the Academic Quarter. Vera joins research team.
